item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, January 19, 2025 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. TikTok goes dark in the US (802 points | 1302 comments)
2. Making glow-in-the-dark Strontium Aluminate (6 points | discuss)
3. “The Traitors”, a reality TV show, offers a useful economics lesson (58 points | 35 comments)
4. Haskell: A Great Procedural Language (120 points | 74 comments)
5. How hard would it be to display the contents of an image file on the screen? (32 points | 4 comments)
6. Alignment faking in large language models (16 points | 1 comment)
7. GitHub introduces sub-issues, issue types and advanced search (146 points | 76 comments)
8. How Unix spell ran in 64kb RAM (168 points | 31 comments)
9. Rust: Investigating an Out of Memory Error (55 points | 17 comments)
10. Forgejo: A self-hosted lightweight software forge (201 points | 133 comments)
11. VS Code Pets (421 points | 110 comments)
12. The "35-cent" Commodore 64 softmodem (69 points | 10 comments)
13. Yek: Serialize your code repo (or part of it) to feed into any LLM (89 points | 41 comments)
14. Show HN: Interactive systemd – a better way to work with systemd units (465 points | 172 comments)
15. Australian Open resorts to animated caricatures to bypass broadcast restrictions (180 points | 86 comments)
16. Hologram: A full-stack isomorphic Elixir web framework (87 points | 23 comments)
17. 'Once-in-a-century' discovery reveals luxury of Pompeii (78 points | 39 comments)
18. Volkswagen Sausage and the Enduring Appeal of Culinary Car-Industry Crossovers (3 points | discuss)
19. Reverse Engineering a VanMoof E-Shifter – Part 2 – Decoding the Signals (24 points | 4 comments)
20. Why do bees die when they sting you? (296 points | 213 comments)
21. Generating an infinite world with the Wave Function Collapse algorithm (233 points | 63 comments)
22. Boosting Computational Fluid Dynamics Performance with AMD MI300X (32 points | 14 comments)
23. Tracing Military Command Chains Through Time and Location (66 points | 9 comments)
24. WASM GC isn't ready for realtime graphics (125 points | 68 comments)
25. Second-Hand Bookshops in Britain: 2024 Report (72 points | 27 comments)
26. The AMD Radeon Instinct MI300A's Giant Memory Subsystem (201 points | 86 comments)
27. Dusa Programming Language (Finite-Choice Logic Programming) (151 points | 35 comments)
28. Properties and Far-infrared Variability of a z = 7 Blazar (6 points | discuss)
29. Pharaoh's Tomb HD – A Remake Made in JavaScript with Kaplay (106 points | 38 comments)
30. Show HN: LLMpeg (128 points | 61 comments)
